game.name: Cyberpunk Girls
game.shortDescription: Cyberpunk Girl is a brutal action shooter set in the year 2169 in the cyber metropolis Oplot. The city of the future, which has become a save heaven for thugs, hackers, and gold diggers. Win the most breathtaking battles. And remember that everything comes with a price.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cyberpunk Girl is a brutal action shooter set in the year 2169 in the cyber metropolis Oplot. The city of the future, which has become a save heaven for thugs, hackers, and gold diggers. Win the most breathtaking battles. And remember that everything comes with a price.

reviewHighlights.text: 그냥 간단하게 적음. 이거 야겜아님. 플레이 방식은 전의 그 히틀러 딸딸이 게임과 같음. 설명 끝. 내가이걸 왜 샀냐면 그냥 번들할인되는걸 유지하려고 샀음.(3740원)
